text: Kare-ra wa, jibun ga isuramu ni kie shite, anata ni taisuru on o hodokoshita yo ni omotte iru. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata no kie wa, watashi e no megumi to wa naranai. Moshi anata gataga shinjitsu (kie shita)nara, arra wa, anata gata o shinko ni michibiku koto o, anata gata e no megumi to nasareru nodearu
